body:
Properly set up models already have cuts for dismemberment, which the engine can handle. Use this to add a tool for combining pieces from different models.

- option to "explode" the model
- ability to export GLM of result (with explanation of licensing implications)
- optional automatic alignment of dismemberment caps? (take vertices touching cap, match with opposite corresponding vertices, interpolate location & weights to meet in middle)
- result playable without exporting to GLM
- save/load parameters

keyword: kitbash

milestone.title: Tools
milestone.description: Make the game easier to mod.
